doc.after: Following the outbreak of the civil war in Somalia and the ensuing collapse of the central government residents reverted to local forms of conflict resolution either secular traditional or Islamic law with a provision for appeal of all sentences The legal structure in the country was thus divided along three lines civil law religious law and customary law xeer 67
